phrases: Summer vacation is finally here for us girls!
But how dare they interfere with our vacation?!
How dare they steal summer away from these helpless young girls?!
In the name of the moon, Sailor Moon will punish you!
Gomen ne sunao ja nakute yume no naka nara ieru
Shikou kairo wa short sunzen i am about to sugu aitai yo
Nakitakunaru you na moonlight denwa mo dekinai midnight
Datte junjou dou shiyou heart wa mangekyou
Seiza no matataki kazoe uranau koi no yukue
Onaji kuni ni umareta no miracle romance
I do not look like a super heroine, but I am!
As you know, I transform myself by using a peculiar brooch
I am the sailor warrior of love and justice, Sailor Moon!
And my friends are the smart and sweet Ami Mizuno,
and a slightly quick-tempered psychic girl, Rei Hino.
Both of them are so dependable, I feel like I will fall behind.
But anyway, I just have to do my best!
The smell of the ocean is so good!
It seems like a nice place.
I wish I could have brought Naru, too.
Usagi, this trip is not for fun!
We came all this way for training camp to become better sailor warriors!
Inaka Hama I am so happy!
Is the pension you reserved close by?
Is the pension you reserved close by?
Yes, it looks like it is on the headland up ahead.
Yes, it looks like it is on the headland up ahead.
Rei, this pension had better be a nice place.
And yachts sailing with their white sails unfurled.
A European-style pension on the headland
with a great view of the sunset.
A white private beach is just waiting for you!
Are you sure we are not lost?
You are the one who insisted it was this way!
It is your fault for not properly checking things out!
It looks like it is going to rain!
This is the pension I booked!
Thank you, you were a great help.
Are you the guests with reservations?
We are from Tokyo and my name is Rei Hino.
We have been waiting for you.
It is nice to meet you.
How long are you going to make a fuss about this?
I bet you would be, after making such a commotion.
But do not you think the people here are a little weird?
What if this place turns out to be a haunted house?
But her neck snaked out and...
No, Usagi, I am not helping you out anymore!
But they seem like nice people.
Sakiko, stay away from those frivolous girls!
Why did you book a pension like this?!
Because this place is incredibly cheap!
and the costumes of the employees here are fun.
Those two are our selling points.
It is just our eyes playing tricks on us.
I do not feel any monster aura.
But I did feel some kind of strong power.
You are a very good girl.
And now, you will slowly, very slowly wake up.
It makes yesterday's commotion seem like it never happened.
I know, it feels so good.
This is definitely a private beach, but...
If it is because people avoid coming here...
The silhouette of a ship sailing off the coast.
But, I will have fun anyway!
Math II did not come out of her room this morning either.
Did not come out of her room this morning either.
Ami, you brought your text books with you?!
Youth is a priceless thing that you only have once!
Studying is important, but you have to play when it is time to play!
I think it is important to create nice memories that way!
Usagi is actually saying something reasonable.
Usagi, let us have lots of fun!
That is what I want to hear!
Both of you are so mean!
Luna, you are there, are not you?
How many times do I have to tell you?!
Begone, Evil Spirit Begone, evil spirits!
Begone, Evil Spirit Begone, evil spirits!
Now, no one will disturb us at dinner!
It was a stronger, more tangible power.
I will go crazy if things like this keep happening everyday.
We have no choice, but to do it.
I agree, but we can never let those girls find out.
And I had not even introduced myself yet.
I was watching you from here all afternoon.
Ladylike Rei, slightly clumsy Usagi, and the cat, Luna.
You remind me of how I was not so long ago.
Because you are all by yourself.
The best thing to do is to become friends with Usagi!
She will cheer you right up!
How many times have I told you not to talk to strangers?!
You girls should get out of here quickly!
That is, if you do not want to be in more frightening situations.
Ami and her friends are nice people!
I was so close to becoming friends with them!
Sakiko, you have a strong psychic power.
Then just let me take care of it.
Your power has improved quite a bit, thanks to my hypnosis.
Or are you saying you will not listen to your father, your only parent?!
Now, focus on this coin, Sakiko.
Focus your attention on this coin!
All those people laughed and said our psychic powers were fake.
Now, show them your incredible power!
you will become the pioneer of the spiritual community.
They are just normal human beings.
But right now, there is a tremendous power
being brought into existence somewhere in this mansion.
Now, create the figure of a ghost!
That should be easy for you by now.
You have done a splendid job!
We will get back at everyone who called us fakes!
You just had to book this pension!
This is not the time for that right now!
No, I do not want to!
No, I do not want to!
No, I do not want to!
We are all going to become possessed if we do not do anything!
I am the sailor warrior of love and justice, Sailor Moon!
Mean ghost, ruining the vacation of these helpless young girls!
In the name of the moon, Sailor Moon will...
I do not want to anymore.
Sakiko, cannot you erase that ghost somehow?!
It should have disappeared once I woke up!
You cannot control that ghost anymore!
Sakiko did not want to listen to her father anymore,
and that feeling was magnified, making it uncontrollable!
I knew you just wanted to live like a normal girl, but I...
Everyone, I just wanted everyone to acknowledge
that Sakiko possessed truly strong powers,
and though I knew that she hated her powers, I continued training her.
And I used the guests who happened to come to this pension
Then, what about those other people?
They were probably just scared of the ghost
and tried to conduct an exorcism.
Why do you guys keep picking on me?!
Hey, Sakiko, you laughed at me, did not you?!
Will there really be no more ghosts?
we just cannot deal with apparitions and ghosts!
It will never show up again.
Yume no naka futari de ita yo ne
Tomodachi no toki ni wa ki ni sezu
Anata dake ki ni naru shunkan ga atta no
Motto kirei ni i am about to sugu naritai
Koi suru to nanika ga kawaru ne
Dakishimeta tokimeki sono mama kono omoi tsutaetai
